articles.title: Russia proposes Feb. 24 launch of relief ship after space station leak - CGTN
articles.description: Russia's space agency on Saturday proposed the launch of a ship on February 24 to bring two Russian cosmonauts and an American astronaut back from the International Space Station (ISS), news agencies reported.

articles.title: Carter Center: Former President Jimmy Carter in hospice care - CP24
articles.description: Former President Jimmy Carter, who at 98 years old is the longest-lived American president, has entered home hospice care in Plains, Georgia, a statement from The Carter Center confirmed Saturday.
